tool_description: Uses AI Language Models to create a custom summary of provided text.
name: ExtractoAPI
title: ExtractoAPI

api_list.name: Summarize
api_list.description: Summarize provided text with optional style arguments to format and adjust the writing style of the model.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://extractoapi.p.rapidapi.com/summarize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "extractoapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://extractoapi.p.rapidapi.com/summarize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "extractoapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
